website_summaries.verdict: A top choice in curing iron sets with an attractive finish.
pros: This set not only gets top marks for its pretty rose-gold finish, but also for the fact that it creates lasting, natural-looking curls
Customers say it's easy to use, well-made, and worth the cost
It also stands out for heating quickly and having an easy-to-read temperature display
cons: The high heat setting can be damaging to thin or fragile hair, so use caution

customer_reviews.title: the result turns out to be surprisingly good! It makes my hairs look wavy naturally
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to try out some new hairstyles for myself. After using the curling iron, the result turns out to be surprisingly good! It makes my hairs look wavy naturally. Also, I like this iron wand set, especially its rose gold color and the 3 different sizes/patterns of wands. Bonus: It reflects the real-time temperature and is adjustable to the temperature best-suited to your hair. This set comes with 2 different sizes of gloves. Be sure to wear the glove provided!
customer_reviews.author: Queeny

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cool! I have never owned a wand before so i was very excited to get them in. It was nice because the booklet tells you which wand to use based on hair type and what curl you want. It also explains how to use it. I am not normally good with hair tools but it worked great and created really nice lasting curls. For a beginner they are great! However they do get really hot (duh) but there is no stand so be careful what you set it on because there is nothing to prop it up.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use pink glove
customer_reviews.text: Cleans up easily. The pink plastic if one of the gloves melted onto the barrel. It was a mess! But it just wiped off! Don’t use pink glove!
customer_reviews.author: anita doran

customer_reviews.title: Nice product as gift!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! This curling iron set is so beautiful. I love this rose gold color so much! The product comes with a nice box. Great gift for girls. You can do different hairstyle by using these curling irons. It's nice to have the glove, too. The instruction that included in this product is very useful! It helps me a lot! Overall, this is a great product! Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Qing He

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this curling iron. I have thick hair so my other ones weren’t holding my curls as well. This is easy to use and my hair looks great. I can get my mourning routine done faster.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: I feel It's easier to use than regular curlers. ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel It's easier to use than regular curlers. It doesn't change back to the original hairstyle until after shampooing. And the glove really heat proof . My hair still kind of short . Can’t wait to curl my long hair
customer_reviews.author: Guo Qin Zheng

customer_reviews.title: Stopped heating up after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 4 months with minimal use. I can get it to turn on but no longer heats up. Never even got to change the wand heads once. Don’t buy, doesn’t last.
customer_reviews.author: Hhhggg

customer_reviews.title: I really love Amazon
customer_reviews.text: i wasn’t happy with this Ela at all , but i have to give a big Shoutout to one of the Customer Service Agents his First Name is Thirty i have no clue what his last name is but he treated me like i was his own Family and that’s why i love Amazon he Fought for me and i was a bit late returning my package but i have had personal things happened in my family that i had no control over and he talked to the supervisor and explained my situation and he got everything straightened out so again Ty Thirty and Amazon for going beyond the time limit that you normally do
customer_reviews.author: JENNY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this!! It works quickly and well, and there is a nice variety of attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for Ela service team
customer_reviews.text: thanks for the item ,, I had issues with the item when I got it so I had to return due to this matter ,, the Ela service team sent another item to try out with no cost ( I'd say it is a replacement even that I didn't ask for it ) ,, but thank you so much for this opportunity cause I really liked the look of the item and hopping the results as good as the item ,, will try it ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Lidya.89

customer_reviews.title: Love it, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: fast delivery, awesome product, I like it so much and can't wait to use it immediately. Easy to use, and good quality. Will recommendate to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Heat's up very fast
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Heat's up very fast.Easy temp control.I love the spiral and big wand,meet all my curly needs.It gives beautiful curls.Pretty nice! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty rose gold
customer_reviews.text: Pretty rose gold,looks luxury and exquisite. Easy to read lcd temperature control make it suitable for all hair types. 2 gloves included in the box for different palm size? Really considerate. Anyway it is perfect and worth more than the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this curling wand set.Beautiful rose gold,and great gift well packaged.This gives nice natural curls.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Keller

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t be more happier. This is a great set for hair curler wand. They’re made well and super easy to change out. It comes with 3 different wand so you can design your own hair style. It is easy to use and it heats up really quick and curls really well. The glove is very useful coz it can prevent you not to get burned. Great product and worth more than the price!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: xliu

product_meta.title: ELA Hair Curling Iron and Wand Set with Interchangeable Titanium Barrels (32/32mm Spiral Roller, 19/32 Tapered wand, 9/18mmTwirl) Professional Salon Styling Tool
feature_bullets: 1 Interchangeable Curling Wand, 3 Rose Gold Titanium Barrels;
32/32mm Spiral Roller, 19/32 Tapered Wand 9/18mmTwirl, for Endless Curl Styles,
MCH, Nano Ionic Ceramic and Titanium Technology, achieving smoother and shiny curls;
82-232℃/180-450℉,easy-to-read LED display; Dual Voltage (110V-240V); Cool Barrel Tips; 60 Minutes Auto Shut off; 2.5m (8.2ft) Swivel Cord.
